sentences.english: We also have carbon s p 2 hydrogen 1 s bonds.

sentences.chinese: 本论文研制了一种新型烯烃氢甲酰化催化剂。

sentences.english: The hydrogen propulsion system will be the key to Phantom Eye's success.
sentences.chinese: 氢推进系统将是幻影眼成功的关键。

sentences.english: Hydrogen nis also one of the coolest refrigerants.
sentences.chinese: 氢是温度最低的冷冻剂。

sentences.english: Water consists of hydrogen and oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 水是由氢，氧化合而成的。

sentences.english: Hydrogen is the lightest element in nature.
sentences.chinese: 氢是自然界中最轻元素。

sentences.english: So it's going to be a sigma bond, 1s and we have oxygen 2 s p 3 and hydrogen 1 s.
Compare with liquid hydrogen, slush hydrogen has a lot of advantages.
sentences.chinese: 与液氢相比，浆氢具有许多优点。

sentences.english: Cars powered by hydrogen fuel cells are another option.
sentences.chinese: 氢燃料箱电池车是另一种选择。

sentences.english: It could also be break down and be component part ---oxygen and hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: 水也可以分解成化学元素，氧和氢。

sentences.english: They detected a heavy hydrogen molecule called hydrogen deuteride.
sentences.chinese: 他们探测出了一种叫做氘化氢的高质量氢分子。

sentences.chinese: 他们探测出了一种叫做氘化氢的高质量氢分子。

sentences.english: But, it could be not just atomic hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: 但是，它不能仅仅是原子氢。

sentences.english: The inulin hydrogen breath test accurately reflects orocaecal transit time.
sentences.chinese: 菊粉氢呼气试验精确反映口盲传输时间。

sentences.english: Hydrofining is a process of various oil products upgrading under hydrogen pressure.
sentences.chinese: 加氢精制是各种油品在氢压下进行催化改质的统称。

definition: deuterium 2H/heavy hydrogen, isotope of hydrogen having 1 neutron in its nucleus, so atomic weight 2
tritium 3H/radioactive isotope of hydrogen having 2 neutrons in its nucleus, so atomic weight 3
